entry.title: New release for VoucherVault: v1.18.0
entry.content:
[!TIP] Coupons now support monetary, percentage and multiplier values

Features

  • add multiplier for coupons (f9b0ad5)

entry.title: New release for VoucherVault: v1.19.0
entry.content:
[!TIP] Visual improvements regarding shared items and a new filter in inventory view.

Sharing center now indicates who shared an item with you.

Features

  • improve sharing views (9dfc473)
